org.ow2.bonita.facade.def.majorElement
Interface ActivityDefinition

All Superinterfaces:
DescriptionElement, NamedElement, ProcessElement, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ActivityDefinitionImpl
public interface ActivityDefinition
extends ProcessElement, Serializable

This interface represents the activity definition.

boolean hasBoundaryEvents()
Checks whether the activity contains boundary events.

Returns:

getBoundaryEvents

List<BoundaryEvent> getBoundaryEvents()
Retrieves the list of all boundary events of the activity.

Returns:
the list of all boundary events or an empty list if the activity has no boundary events.

getBoundaryEvent

BoundaryEvent getBoundaryEvent(String eventName)
Retrieves the boundary event of the activity according to its name.

Returns:
the boundary event or null if the event does not exist

getSubflowProcessName

String getSubflowProcessName()
Returns the SubFlowDefinition interface if this activity has subflow implementation otherwise returns null.

getSubflowProcessVersion

String getSubflowProcessVersion()

getPerformers

Set<String> getPerformers()
Returns the performer of the activity. For an activity with startMode=Manual the performer element contains a defined participant processDefinitionUUID. For an activity with startMode=Automatic the performer element contains the generic participant SYSTEM.

getDeadlines

Set<DeadlineDefinition> getDeadlines()
Deadlines are used to execute a specified java class upon the expiration of a specified period of time. returns (unordered) set of Deadlines. returns empty set if no deadline are defined within the activity.

getDataFields

Set<DataFieldDefinition> getDataFields()
Bonita engine allows to specify dataFields for activities.

Returns:
The (unordered) set of DataFieldDefinition interfaces.

getConnectors

List<HookDefinition> getConnectors()
Hooks are user defined logic that can be triggered at some points of the life of the activity.
Those points are:
  • taskOnReady
  • taskOnStart
  • taskOnFinish

If the activity has startMode=Manual then these points of the life of the activity is synchronized with ones of the task.

Returns:
The (unordered) set of HookDefinition interfaces.

getFilter

FilterDefinition getFilter()
Performer assignment allows to perform various assignment rules within the task module.
All the users defined into the role type can see and execute this one. By adding this functionality, we can:
  • assign the task to a user of the role (group) by calling a java class in charge to the user selection into the user group (callback performer assignment)
  • assign dynamically the activity to a user by using an activity variable
    • (property performer assignment)

Returns:
The PerformerAssignDefinition interface.

Returns:
the MultiInstantiation

getLoopMaximum

String getLoopMaximum()
Gets the maximum number of loop iterations

Returns:
the maximum number of loop iterations as an integer or a Groovy expression

evaluateLoopConditionBeforeExecution

boolean evaluateLoopConditionBeforeExecution()
Checks whether the loop condition is evaluated before the activity creation ("while" loop) or after the activity execution ("until" loop)

Returns:
true if the loop condition must be evaluated before the activity creation.

getDynamicLabel

String getDynamicLabel()
Gets the dynamic label expression. This expression will be used when creating a corresponding ActivityInstance.

getDynamicDescription

String getDynamicDescription()
Gets the dynamic description expression. This expression will be used when creating a corresponding ActivityInstance.

getDynamicExecutionSummary

String getDynamicExecutionSummary()
Gets the dynamic execution summary expression. This expression will be used when completing a corresponding ActivityInstance.

catchEvent

boolean catchEvent()
Checks whether the event activity catches event.

Returns:
true if the event activity catches event; false if the event activity throws event.

isTerminateProcess

boolean isTerminateProcess()
Returns true if the activity ends the process. It works only when the activity have not got any outgoing transitions.
